name: picpop
description: Offline photo booth with touchscreen kiosk and smartphone integration
author: Caleb Bornman

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && uv run uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.dev:kiosk: cd kiosk && bun run tauri dev
scripts.build:kiosk: cd kiosk && bun run tauri build
scripts.build:all: bun run build:frontend && bun run build:kiosk
